string.value: Who do you want to convert to your order?
You caught {0} snooping about! That must be the detective!
{0} came to your house last night, ready to convert you.... but you shoved your sword right through them. A cultist is dead... {1} remain!
The cult has converted you to their order! You are now a cultist. Every other night, you will have a chance to convert another player.
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and convert {1}... but no one was home!
All the wolves have died, and the only people left standing have all been converted to cultists.. The cult has won!
You went to hunt {0}, but they are already dead!
You go into {0}'s house and find them praying before an altar to some unknown god. You quickly run your sword right through the evil cultist.
You go to {0}'s house, but there is no mysterious chanting. You return home, convinced that {0} is not a cultist.
Your newest member heads over to {0}'s house to convert them, but instead finds the house a complete wreck, blood everywhere, and bits of wolf fur snagged on the doorway...
The pack heads to {0}'s house to eat them, but they are met by a tall dark figure, armed to the teeth. The Guardian Angel fights everyone off, and you head back defeated.
You send {0} to try to convert {1}, however their belief was too strong, and you were unable to convert them :(
@{1}, a player with the name {0} has already joined. Please change your name to join.
You slipped into {0}'s house for a bit of fun... but as you are leaving, you happen to notice a strange altar, poorly hidden off in a side room, with a strange glowing coming from it...
{0} added to admin list. Use /config to change group settings.
Your group has managed to start multiple games... Killing extras.
Your group is currently in the queue. Position: {0} / {1}
Sorry, I'm about to start a short maintenance break, you can't start a game right now.\nWaiting on {0} games to end...\nGo to @greywolfdev for more information
Sorry, max concurrent games has been reached ({0}). \nPosition in queue: {1} / {1}
ู ุงูู ูุนุจุฉ ุดุบุงูู ุุงุจุฏุฃ ูุนุจุฉ ุฌุฏูุฏุฉ ู ู .. /startgame ุฃู /startchaos
{0} fumbles for their pistol as the noose tightens, but cannot get it in time, and falls to their death with a loud snap of their neck...
{0} whips out their pistol and looks at the crowd... and cannot make a decision on who to shoot. They fall to their death, accepting their fate...
The blow to {0} was too much, so much that they couldn't even reach for their sidearm, as they lay in a pool of blood...
The cult sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but instead a shot rings out and {0}'s body comes flying out of the window! {0} is dead....
The cult sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but instead {0}'s body comes flying out of the window, knives pushed into every part of their body! WHAT A PSYCHO! {0} is dead....

{0} sneaks over to {1}'s house, pops open the door, and is immediately greeted by a crazed maniac with a knife!!! {1} plunges the knife deep into {0}'s organs in alphabetical order, cackling the entire time! {0} is dead D:
The doppelganger {0} has now become a cultist, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a cultist. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
A hooded figure tried to convert you to their cult, but your faith was too strong
You are already on the wait list for {0}
You have been added to the wait list for {0}. I will PM you when the next game is starting.\nWhile waiting, why not browse the store? https://teespring.com/stores/werewolf-for-telegram
A new game is starting in {0}
Your role is simple - try to survive. Each day, you will have a chance to lynch the werewolf.
You are the Seer. In this role, each night, you may choose a player, and have their role revealed to you. Admit to your role wisely: If you reveal you are the seer, the wolves will try to kill you!

You get to have fun! Each day, you will attempt to decieve your fellow players. However, each night, you will get to pick a player to kill!\nNote: If you attack the cursed, they will become a wolf like yourself! Hooray friends!\nIf you attack the drunk, you yourself will become drunk, and will be unable to do the next attack as you sleep off your hangover! (Usually, this means you can't attack the following night, but if the Wolf Cub was killed and the Drunk was your first choice, you won't be able to kill the second player, and you will still be able to attack the following night.)

As the harlot (you slut...) you will be given the chance to 'visit' another player each night. If they are not the wolf, you will be told so (because you live!). If you visit a wolf, you will be killed. If you visit the player the wolves have chosen to kill, you will be killed as well. However - If you are visiting a player, and the wolves choose to kill you, you will survive (you weren't home)
You drunken bastard! As the drunk, you are still just a villager. BUT! If the wolves kill you, they will become disabled for the next kill, as they are drunk off your insanely high BAC.
As the cursed, you are a normal villager... until the wolves kill you. Once they do, you will become a wolf as well! Free to hunt in the night..... XD
You are a traitorous bastard. If you survive long enough for all the wolves to die, you will become a werewolf, ready to kill your former teammates in the night!
You are the Guardian Angel! Each night, you may choose a player to watch over. Be careful however - if you choose to watch over a wolf, there is a 50% chance you will be killed.
You old sleuth. Each day, you will have the chance to investigate another player. Use this carefully however, for these is a 40% chance the werewolves will detect you!

A bit trigger happy are we? As the gunner, you are given 2 silver bullets at the beginning of the game. Each day, you will have the chance to shoot another player. Once you do, everyone will know you are the gunner! Be careful though, you only have 2 bullets!
The Tanners goal is simple: Get Lynched. If the Tanner gets lynched, he wins, period. Everyone else loses.
he fool is told they are the seer.... when they choose to see someone's role at night, they are told a random role.
As a cultist, it is your goal to convert all other players (except wolves) to your cult. If at the end of the game, all living players are cultist - the cult wins
Your job is to hunt the Cult. If the cult attacks you, their newest member will die. Each night you may pick a player to 'hunt' - if they are a cultist, they will die.
At the beginning of the game, you will choose someone to be your 'role model'. If they die, you become a werewolf.
For now, you are a normal villager. However, if the seer dies, you will become the new seer
You will be told who the seer is (the real one, not the fool)
A mason's job is simple - they automatically know who the other masons are. Otherwise, they are a simple villager.

Your ancestors had the ability to metamorph into others... while you don't have their full abilities, you can pick a player at the start of the game. If that player dies, you will become what they were. Note: If the player was converted to cult, you will take on their original role. All other normal rules apply: If they were Wild Child and their role model died, you will become a wolf. Otherwise, you will inherit their role model. The cult cannot convert the Doppelgรคnger (but can after the doppelganger switches roles). Also - the Doppelgรคnger can NOT win unless they have transformed. If at the end of the game, the Doppelgรคnger is still the same, they lose (exception: lover)

Love is in the air. As Cupid, you will choose two players at the start of the game. These two players will become madly in love! If one of them dies, the other will die of sorrow :( Note: Lovers will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the lovers are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If the lovers are on different teams (villager + wolf), and one team wins (wolf), the lover (villager) wins as well. TL;DR if at least one of the lovers was on the winning team, they both win together.

A trigger happy, vindictive player. As the hunter, you try to keep to yourself. However, when others come to visit you, they may find themselves dead, as your paranoia takes hold and you shoot. If the wolves attack you, you have a chance to take one of them with you. Otherwise, if you die, you will get a chance to shoot someone as you die. Note: For wolf attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one wolf, the hunter has a 30% chance to kill the wolf (and survive). For each additional wolf, add 20% (2 wolves = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple wolves, while you may kill one of them, you will still be outnumbered and killed. If the cult tries to convert you, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to kill one of them!

That asylum was silly anyways. What a joke. You are free now however, back to business as usual - killing! The serial killer is a lone player, on their own team. They can win only if they are the last player alive (exception: lovers). As the serial killer, you can kill ANYONE - wolves, hunters, gunners, guardian angels, whatever. If the wolves try to attack you, you will kill one of them (random), and live.
Para is a silly developer that likes to bark at people. Maybe he's been messing with werewolves too long....Messing with werewolves is a very bad idea.
An error has occured, and this node has shut down :/
I have sent you a PM
Please send me a pm so I can PM you: @werewolfbot
Thanks for starting me! I can PM you now.
You must reply to the user you want to smite
Time to receive ping message: {0}\nCurrent CPU Usage: {1}%\nMessages per second: {2}
There are no nodes online right now, please try again in a few seconds
You must run this command in a group

Base day time set to {0} seconds
Choose the time (in seconds) for night time. Default setting: {0}\nCurrent:{1}
Choose the time (in seconds) for lynch voting. Default setting: {0}\nCurrent:{1}
Lynch voting time set to {0} seconds
Allow fool as a role option?\nCurrent: {0}
Fool as a role set to: {0}
Allow tanner as a role option?\nCurrent: {0}
Tanner as a role set to: {0}

Thank you, have a good day :)
What language do you want to look for a group to play in?
ุงูุฃุนุถุงุก
Please start me so I can PM you
{0} failed to start the bot, and has been removed from the game!

As mayor, you are a lowly villager, until you reveal yourself. Then you are given twice the vote count for lynching (meaning that your vote is twice as powerful as everyone else's). Use that power wisely to help the Village Team.

The prince is a key role in the Village Team's strategy. Once the prince gets lynched, their role as Prince is revealed, and they survive. However, this can only happen once: if the village insists on lynching them, they will die.
Do you remember the good old seer? Well now, it has its Wolf Team counterpart. The sorcerer is the Wuff's Seer. They can only see if someone is Wolf or Seer, and they win with the Wolves.

You are the Clumsy Guy. Maybe you should not have had so much alcohol for breakfast. You can't see a damn thing. Can you even vote for the person you want to? (You have a 50% chance to vote for someone random.)

You are the BlackSmith. Through the years, no blades nor swords gave you as much satisfaction as the Silver Blades the elves ordered.\nYou might have some silverdust left. Who knows ? It might *prevent Wolves from eating tonight* ๐ค
You are the Alpha Wolf, the origin of the curse, the bane of banes. Every night, there's 20% chance that you will bite your pack's meal, and they will join your ranks instead of dying!

What a cuuuute little wuff. _tickles tickles_ -cough cough- As i was saying, you are the Wolf Cub and you _drops the mic_ -I just can't resist that. I think if anyone killed you, i'd give the wuffs two victims. You're too cute to die. I wouldn't be able to tickle you anymore-
The cult sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but instead {0}'s Head comes flying out of the Window... Wonder why they thought it was inedible! {0} is dead...
{0} was found stabbed to death with a candlestick by their altar. The serial killer has struck again, regardless of race, language or religion! {0} was a Cultist.

The villagers wake up in the morning, only to find the severed body parts of {0}, the Cultist Hunter, in a cart placed in full view outside the town hall. Lesson learnt: don't visit the serial killer!
The body of {0}, the Cultist Hunter, was found in the middle of town, albeit cut precisely into a hundred pieces. Checking if the Serial Killer was a cultist does not seem to be a good idea...

While it seemed that the wolves decided to stay good for once, punishing {0}, a cultist that decided to court trouble with the wolves, proved too difficult to resist. {0}'s head was converted to a fine supper, delivered to the wolves' doorsteps!

The cult ran into unexpected trouble last night. Their newest member had the misfortune of visiting a wolf on the night the wolves decided to stay home, and the wolf found {0} quite delicious. Unfortunately for {0}, wolves have no interest in joining the new religious movement.

The cult thought they would have a new member in their ranks, but they were wrong! {0}, a cultist, was minced to pieces and placed at the town square in the morning! Strangely their "holy" book was found stabbed with a knife, as if a statement to show whose religion was triumphant.

Last night, the cult tried to convert the one person in the village crazier than they are. Their newest member tried to convert the Serial Killer, and the Serial Killer made a new piece of art in the town square of {0}'s internal organs.

{1} and {0} walk out in daylight. Seeing a shimmering cross worn around {0}'s neck, the righteous {1} draws their sword for the final time, putting an end to the twisted learnings of the cult that have contaminated the village.
Join time extended by {0} seconds!\n{1} left to /join
Join time decreased by {0} seconds!\n{1} left to /join
Only group admins can extend the time more than once!
Allow players to extend join time?\nCurrent: {0} extending\nNote: Admins will always be able to extend
Choose maximum number of seconds which can be added to joining timer by a single /extend command.\nDefault setting: {0}\nCurrent:{1}
